description:
My place is close to restaurants and dining, public transport, nightlife, and the beach. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the views, the people, the location, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

this studio is quiet and it is private you can come in when you want. It is all yours until you (URL HIDDEN) is near casino and movie theaters and train to Manhattan  and the airport JFK

If you need help with anything joust ask and I will answer you or I will find out

there is a big park to enjoy  and a pier at Jamaica bay to fish or look at the sunset you can ride bike or jogg

it is close to the train and bus to get to Manhattan
name: Seaview Studio in  Brooklyn New york.
review: My girlfriend and I had a great stay at Natashas place. Everything was clean, all necessary basics were available including vegetables and a filled fridge. In addition, Natasha was very nice and responsive. We will definitively come again.
